backend/main.mo: Defines user profile types, sobriety check-in structures, brutal feedback messages, and includes access control via mixin authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing clean rebuild functionality, associated files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend source files used for build planning.
frontend/CLEAN_REBUILD.md: Documentation explaining when and how to perform a clean frontend rebuild to resolve deployment issues.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for frontend global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, social tags, and root element for the frontend app.
frontend/scripts/clean-rebuild.sh: Shell script that removes build artifacts and caches to perform a clean frontend rebuild.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication flow, actor initialization, status loading, and routing to login, onboarding, or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/BeerDonationDial: Dialog component displaying a donation address with copy-to-clipboard support and closure handling.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendDial: Controlled dialog showing backend or fallback brutal messages with a close button.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendFeed: Fetches and displays the latest brutal friend feedback with loading, error, and fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/ChanceOfDrinking: Shows a random drinking risk level with color‑coded UI and descriptive messaging.
Calculates days until Friday and the next full moon to generate friendly and brutal cycle messages.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckInDial: Modal for daily check-ins letting users report sobriety, drink count, and mood with validation.
frontend/src/components/DataLoggedDialog: Confirmation dialog showing a message and variant‑based subtext after data is logged or updated.
frontend/src/components/DrinksChart.tsx: Renders a 14‑day drinks history bar chart with update detection, loading states, and day normalization.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpCheckInD: Modal for follow‑up check-ins to confirm sobriety or log additional drinks with validation.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Global error boundary that catches render errors and displays a recovery UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with title and a logout button callback.
frontend/src/components/MoodIndicator.ts: Displays the user's most recent mood using progress metrics and shows a loading spinner while fetching.
frontend/src/components/MotivationButton: Provides a button to fetch motivation messages with limited daily clicks and opens a dialog showing the result.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Implements a multi‑step onboarding questionnaire, tracks answers, and submits the final profile to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ProgressStats.ts: Shows sober-day statistics from progress metrics with icons and styled stat cards.
frontend/src/components/RepeatCheckInDia: Dialog for repeat daily check-ins allowing users to confirm sobriety or enter drink count with validation.
frontend/src/components/SoberDaysSection: Displays current sober streak and a target goal with styled cards.
frontend/src/components/StatusIndicators: Calculates and displays today, yesterday, and weekly drink-status indicators based on aggregated chart data.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedHeaderSec: Header component showing brutal friend feedback and a motivational message button with dialog handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handles login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including profiles, check-ins, and onboarding/check-in status.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles including brutalist theme variables, Tailwind layers, neon effects, and layout resets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page orchestrating user session flow, data loading, check-in handling, and UI sections.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: React login screen using Internet Identity with animated logo, a continue button, and brief feature cards.
frontend/src/session/dailySessionFlow.ts: Defines a deterministic session-flow state machine for onboarding and daily check‑in modal sequences.
frontend/src/utils/sobrietyDuration.ts: Parses human-readable sobriety duration text into a numeric day count with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and cleaning URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and container settings for the app’s neon/brutalist theme.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s current features, visual style, session logic, and deployment context.
